name: AXIS (itch)
description:
Send objects through dimensions and come back together!

AXIS is a two-player cooperative game where players send and swap pieces of their environment to the world of the other player, avoiding the Distortion and its monsters along the way.

Game can be played with WASD and SPACEBAR for Player 1, and ARROW KEYS and ENTER for Player 2.

It's currently configured to work with Buffalo SNES Gamepads but more controller support will be added soon.
